languages.text: "Найти разум, способный заменить Авеля, было сложнее всего. Но на нижних палубах "Герметико" отыскалась девушка, чья Фантазия завершила Коллектив. Ее звали... Ты оценишь прихотливость судьбы. Ее звали Нихель".

"Finding a mind that could replace Abel's was the hardest of all. However, a young woman was found on the lower decks of the Hermetico whose Imagination completed our Collective. Her name... You will appreciate fate's subtlety here. Her name was Nihel."
languages.original_text: "Найти разум, способный заменить Авеля, было сложнее всего. Но на нижних палубах "Герметико" отыскалась девушка, чья Фантазия завершила Коллектив. Ее звали... Ты оценишь прихотливость судьбы. Ее звали Нихель".

traits.locale_text: "Finding a mind that could replace Abel's was the hardest of all. However, a young woman was found on the lower decks of the Hermetico whose Imagination completed our Collective. Her name... You will appreciate fate's subtlety here. Her name was Nihel."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Finding a mind that could replace Abel's was the hardest of all. However, a young woman was found on the lower decks of the Hermetico whose Imagination completed our Collective. Her name... You will appreciate fate's subtlety here. Her name was Nihel."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “最困难的事情，是找到可以代替亚伯的思想。不过，我们在隐士之舟号的下层甲板找到了一位年轻女性，她的想象力帮助我们完成了我们的聚合意识。至于她的名字……你一定会很欣赏命运的微妙安排，她的名字叫妮赫尔。”
languages.original_text: "Finding a mind that could replace Abel's was the hardest of all. However, a young woman was found on the lower decks of the Hermetico whose Imagination completed our Collective. Her name... You will appreciate fate's subtlety here. Her name was Nihel."

traits.locale_text: “最困难的事情，是找到可以代替亚伯的思想。不过，我们在隐士之舟号的下层甲板找到了一位年轻女性，她的想象力帮助我们完成了我们的聚合意识。至于她的名字……你一定会很欣赏命运的微妙安排，她的名字叫雅珀。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Encontrar una mente que pudiera sustituir a la de Abel fue lo más difícil de todo. Sin embargo, encontramos a una joven en las cubiertas inferiores del Hermético cuya Imaginación completó el Colectivo. Se llamaba... creo que sabrá apreciar la sutileza del destino. Se llamaba Nihel».
languages.original_text: "Finding a mind that could replace Abel's was the hardest of all. However, a young woman was found on the lower decks of the Hermetico whose Imagination completed our Collective. Her name... You will appreciate fate's subtlety here. Her name was Nihel."

traits.locale_text: «Encontrar una mente que pudiera sustituir a la de Abel fue lo más difícil de todo. Sin embargo, encontramos a una joven en las cubiertas inferiores del Hermético cuya Imaginación completó el Colectivo. Se llamaba... creo que sabrá apreciar la sutileza del destino. Se llamaba Nihel».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「アベルの代わりとなる心を見つけるのは最も困難だった。しかし、ヘルメティコの下層デッキで、私たちの集合体を完成させる想像力を持つ若い女性が見つかった。彼女の名は…ここに、運命の機微をご理解いただけるだろう。彼女の名はニヘルという」
languages.original_text: "Finding a mind that could replace Abel's was the hardest of all. However, a young woman was found on the lower decks of the Hermetico whose Imagination completed our Collective. Her name... You will appreciate fate's subtlety here. Her name was Nihel."

traits.locale_text: 「アベルの代わりとなる心を見つけるのは最も困難だった。しかし、ヘルメティコの下層デッキで、私たちの集合体を完成させる想像力を持つ若い女性が見つかった。彼女の名は…ここに、運命の機微をご理解いただけるだろう。彼女の名はニヘルという」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Am schwierigsten war es, einen Verstand zu finden, der Abels ersetzen kann. Doch auf den Unterdecks der Hermetico wurde eine junge Frau entdeckt, deren Imagination unser Kollektiv vervollständigte. Ihr Name ... Ihr werdet den subtilen Humor des Schicksals zu schätzen wissen. Ihr Name war Nihel."
languages.original_text: "Finding a mind that could replace Abel's was the hardest of all. However, a young woman was found on the lower decks of the Hermetico whose Imagination completed our Collective. Her name... You will appreciate fate's subtlety here. Her name was Nihel."

traits.locale_text: "Am schwierigsten war es, einen Verstand zu finden, der Abels ersetzen kann. Doch auf den Unterdecks der Hermetico wurde eine junge Frau entdeckt, deren Imagination unser Kollektiv vervollständigte. Ihr Name ... Ihr werdet den subtilen Humor des Schicksals zu schätzen wissen. Ihr Name war Nihel."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le plus difficile fut de trouver un esprit capable de remplacer celui d'Abel. Nous avons toutefois trouvé une jeune femme dans les ponts inférieurs de l'Hermetico dont l'Imagination complétait notre collectif. Elle s'appelait... Nihel. Je sais que la subtilité du destin ne vous échappera pas. »
languages.original_text: "Finding a mind that could replace Abel's was the hardest of all. However, a young woman was found on the lower decks of the Hermetico whose Imagination completed our Collective. Her name... You will appreciate fate's subtlety here. Her name was Nihel."

traits.locale_text: « Le plus difficile fut de trouver un esprit capable de remplacer celui d'Abel. Nous avons toutefois trouvé une jeune femme dans les ponts inférieurs de l'Hermetico dont l'Imagination complétait notre collectif. Elle s'appelait... Nihel. Je sais que la subtilité du destin ne vous échappera pas. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Finding a mind that could replace Abel's was the hardest of all. However, a young woman was found on the lower decks of the Hermetico whose Imagination completed our Collective. Her name... You will appreciate fate's subtlety here. Her name was Nihel."

languages.text: "En zoru, Abel'in yerini alabilecek bir zihin bulmaktı. Hermetico'nun aşağı güvertelerinde bulunan genç bir kadının Hayal Gücü ile Bütünlük tamamlandı. Kadının ismi... Kaderin bu küçük oyunu senin de hoşuna gidecektir. İsmi Nihel'di."
languages.original_text: "Finding a mind that could replace Abel's was the hardest of all. However, a young woman was found on the lower decks of the Hermetico whose Imagination completed our Collective. Her name... You will appreciate fate's subtlety here. Her name was Nihel."

traits.locale_text: "Abel'in yerini alabilecek bir zihin bulmak en zoruydu. Hermetico'nun aşağı güvertelerinde bulunan genç bir kadının Hayal Gücü, Bütünlük'ümüzü tamamladı ama. İsmi... Kaderin küçük oyunu senin de hoşuna gidecektir. İsmi Nihel'di."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
